results.content: Teaches concepts ok.  But this course was not created for Udemy.  It was created for a private training website.  I asked a question to the trainer 2 months ago about downloading the source code and he never responded.  it means the instructor just wants to make money by copying the course to another training provider and then forgets about helping the students.

results.content: Excellent example of how to create responsive webdesign, and the web design itself is really good looking.
results.content_html: Excellent example of how to create responsive webdesign, and the web design itself is really good looking.

results.content:
As a typesetter - have been playing with HTML, CSS in between everything else with huge time gaps in between.
Would learn it, and then forget details. Just have never been able to do it enough for it to become second nature. 
As responsive goes - this was an excellent course for me to cross the t's and dot the I's on the quick. Thank you!
